hero.title: Join Our School
hero.body: Admissions are open for new students. Registration forms are available for N5,000. Basic child information is required, and our school fees remain affordable for families.

osdd.heading: Big News
osdd.body: We’re now an OSSD Grade 12 pathway for students preparing for university. Partnered with Convoy International Academy — first intakes January 2026. A fast-track 7-month program to support admissions abroad.

intake.title: January Intake
intake.offer: Special Offer: 20-50% discount available for a limited number of January OSSD first intakes.

health.title: Important: Student Health Requirements
health.body: Parents are reminded to ensure all student inoculations are up to date before enrollment. Please contact the school office for approved guidelines and required documentation.
